alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 17 at 3:33AM EST until December 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Vermont, Eastern Rutland and Windsor Counties. In New York, Eastern Clinton, Southeastern St. Lawrence, Western Essex, Southern Franklin and Western Clinton Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will occur through sunrise, before gradually weakening through the remainder of the morning hours.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
